explains: adj. 加速的；加快的；跳级的
v. 加速；促进（accelerate 的变形）
wordGroup: accelerated life test 加速寿命试验
accelerated aging test 加速老化试验
accelerated ageing 加速老化；人工老化
accelerated corrosion test 加速腐蚀试验

sentences.en: The runners accelerated smoothly around the bend.
sentences.cn: 赛跑运动员在转弯处顺畅地加速。

sentences.en: During the last recession, migration to the sunbelt accelerated.
sentences.cn: 前一个经济萧条期间，向美国南部阳光地带移民的速度加快了。
